page.title: 09Local History
page.content: {My Village - Camblesforth } I live in the village of Camblesforth which is five miles away from Selby in the County of North Yorkshire. I have lived in Camblesforth all my life. The village is growing. There is a Post Office which also sells groceries. There is a mini-market, a small supermarket, a hairdresser, and a fish and chip shop which has customers from local villages as well as residents. The village hall has a new extension and has just been repainted and is very well used. The Primary School moved into new buildings in 1972. The village is dominated by Drax Power Station. This was started in 1967 with a second phase begun in 1977. When complete it will be the largest coal-fired power station in Western Europe.
